Warren Williams Jr. (born July 29, 1965) is an American former professional football running back. He played college football at the University of Miami.
College statistics
*1984: 29 carries for 140 yards. 13 catches for 154 yards and 1 touchdown.
*1985: 89 carries for 522 yards and 4 touchdowns. 14 catches for 131 yards.
*1986: 80 carries for 399 yards and 3 touchdowns. 13 catches for 114 yards and 2 touchdowns.
*1987: 135 carries for 673 yards and 5 touchdowns. 30 catches for 309 yards and 1 touchdown.
Professional career
Williams played in National Football League (NFL) for the Pittsburgh Steelers from 1988 to 1992 and the Indianapolis Colts in 1993. He was selected by the Steelers in the sixth round of the 1988 NFL draft with the 155th overall pick.
